input.sentences: i had a great time at my wedding yesterday .
we took a lot of pictures .
we hired a professional and bought some flowers .
it was a lot of money .
output.sentences: Yesterday was one of my best friend's wedding day.
I took at lot of pictures for her so I can make her a photo album of the day.
She also hired a professional photographer and florist.
In no time the service was over!
Weddings cost a lot of money for such a short ceremony.
